      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void GameController.performAction​(Action action)

      void GameState.setAction​(Action action)

    • Uses of Action in clue.action

      Subclasses of Action in clue.action 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AccuseAction
      Represents a player making an accusation
      class  AvoidSuggestionAction
      Represents a player avoiding showing cards during the ShowCardAction through use of an intrigue card.
      class  EndTurnAction
      Represents the end of the game turn.
      class  ExtraTurnAction
      Represents a player taking an extra turn through the use of an intrigue card.
      class  KickAction
      Represents a Player on the network being removed from the game.
      class  MoveAction
      Represents a player moving from Tile s to Tile t
      class  ShowCardAction
      Represents one player showing a card to another player.
      class  ShowCardsAction
      Represents a player being prompted to show a card.
      class  StartAction
      Represents a game instance being started.
      class  StartTurnAction
      Represents the start of the next turn.
      class  SuggestAction
      Represents a Player making a suggestion.
      class  ThrowAgainAction
      Represents a Player being able to roll again due to a roll again intrigue card being used.
